algorithm_technique: Generate candidate palindromes by modifying the prefix and compare with the input.
problem_summary_simple: Find the palindrome closest to a given number, excluding the number itself.
problem_summary_technical: Generates palindromes from prefix variations (prefix-1, prefix, prefix+1) and finds the closest to the input number.
key_insights: The closest palindrome is likely formed by modifying the first half of the input number.
Consider edge cases like powers of 10 and numbers with all 9s.
The absolute difference and the value itself are used for tie-breaking.
